channel.title: Need command help!

item.title: Need command help!
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“Gohan23141, post:1, topic:407363”]How do I make it so only 2 people can give someone donator so its like this

&& c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spencer”)) {

But how do i add the second name?[/quote]
Try something like && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Spencer") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("2ndnamehere")) {

Read full topic
